steps.title: Go to https://www.bluestacks.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.bluestacks.com in a web browser. The website will automatically detect your operating system and display a "Download BlueStacks" button near the center of the page.

steps.title: Click Download BlueStacks.
steps.content: Click Download BlueStacks . This saves the Bluestacks installer to your computer. Depending on your browser, you may have to click Save or Download to start the download.

steps.title: Double-click the BlueStacks installer.
steps.content: Double-click the BlueStacks installer. Once the file is finished downloading, you can click BlueStacks-Installer(version).exe at the bottom-left corner of your browser. If you don't see it there, open your Downloads folder, then double-click the installer.

steps.title: Click Yes to allow the installer to run.
steps.content: Click Yes to allow the installer to run.

steps.title: Click Install Now.
steps.content: Click Install Now . BlueStacks will now install on your PC. When the installation is complete, a new window will open. If you are upgrading from a previous version, click Continue , and then click Upgrade .

steps.title: Click Complete.
steps.content: Click Complete . BlueStacks is now installed and will launch automatically. You'll also be able to launch it by clicking its name or icon in the Start menu.

steps.title: Go to https://www.bluestacks.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.bluestacks.com in a web browser. The website will automatically detect your operating system and display a "Download BlueStacks" button near the center of the page.

steps.title: Click Download BlueStacks.
steps.content: Click Download BlueStacks . This saves the Bluestacks installer to your computer. Depending on your browser, you may have to click Save or Download to start the download.

steps.title: Double-click the BlueStacks installer.
steps.content: Double-click the BlueStacks installer. It'll be in the Downloads folder once the file is installed. Look for the file called BlueStacksInstaller(versionnumber).dmg .

steps.title: Double-click the BlueStacks icon on the window.
steps.content: Double-click the BlueStacks icon on the window. It's the stack of sideways squares at the center of the blue window. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click Install.
steps.content: Click Install . It's the blue button at the center of the window.

steps.title: Click Continue to accept the terms.
steps.content: Click Continue to accept the terms. To review the terms before accepting, click the terms link below "Welcome to Bluestacks."

steps.title: Allow BlueStacks to install if the installation is blocked.
steps.content: Allow BlueStacks to install if the installation is blocked. If you see a message that says "System Extension Blocked," you'll need to take some additional steps to install the app: Click Open Security Preferences on the pop-up window. Click the General tab if not already selected. Click Allow at the bottom-right corner of the window.

steps.title: Launch BlueStacks.
steps.content: Launch BlueStacks. One BlueStacks is installed, you can run the program by clicking its icon (a stack of multicolored squares) in the Applications folder.
